articles.content:
February Issue of Journal "The Juche Idea" Published 
    Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The National Liaison Council of the Japan Society for the Study of Kim Jong Il's Works brought out the February issue of journal "The Juche Idea".
 The journal edited news that studying sessions and film shows on the Juche idea and Japan-DPRK friendship were held in Tokyo, Osaka and Hiroshima on the occasion of the New Year, and articles titled "For the movement for learning the Juche idea to retake love and trust among people" and "Let's advance toward future with friends" written by Japanese followers of the Juche idea, and an article introducing chapter 18 of book "Kim Jong Il's Biography" Vol. 2, published by the International Institute of the Juche Idea.    
 The journal carried a photo-accompanied account of colorful functions for promoting the improvement of Japan-DPRK relations held in Saitama and Kochi and an article titled "Developing Asia-isolated Japan".
